exceptions.exn: In environment P : nat -> Prop LPO_min : forall n : nat, P n \\/ ~ P n The term "P" has type "nat -> Prop" while it is expected to have type "nat".

original: intros P LPO_min. pose proof (LPO_min P) as [[n H1]|H2]. - left. exists n. apply H1. - right. intros n H3. destruct (H2 n) as [H4 _]. contradiction (H4 H3).
